content.text:
# 13th Canadian Folk Music Awards

-->
| location       = Bronson Centre, Ottawa, Ontario
| country        = Canada
| reward         =
| year           =

| holder         =
| website        = [http://folkawards.ca/ folkawards.ca]

The 13th Canadian Folk Music Awards were presented in Ottawa, Ontario on November 19, 2017.
Nominees and recipients
Recipients are listed first and highlighted in boldface.
{| class=wikitable width="100%"
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%" | Traditional Album
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%" | Contemporary Album
|-
| valign="top" |
*  'Cassie and Maggie, The Willow Collection'
* Jayme Stone, Folklife
* André Brunet, La grosse maison rouge
* Còig, Rove
* Jenny Whiteley, The Original Jenny Whiteley
| valign="top" |
*  'Abigail Lapell, Hide Nor Hair'
* The Fretless, ''Bird's Nest
* Tomato Tomato, I Go Where You Go
* Braden Gates, Much Rather Be Sleeping
* Leif Vollebekk, Twin Solitude''
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%" | Children's Album
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%" | Traditional Singer

* Madame Diva and Micah le jeune voyageur, Zing-E-Zing!
| valign="top" |

* Mélisande Gélinas-Fauteux, Les millésimes

|-

| valign="top" |
